text: Fatemiyoun is a Afghani Shiite jihadist group in Syria to fight against rebels in the country and support the leader Bashar al-Assad. The group pledges allegiance to Iran (specifically the IRGC) and members of the group are given Iranian passports. The group also uses child soldiers for fighting against rebels. == References == Category:Organizations based in Syria Category:Shia organizations
title: Fatemiyoun
